title: Love Island's Adam Collard desperately seeks attention as he strips off for naked snap
text:

Adam Collard shared a sizzling new sultry snap to his Instagram page on Monday.

The former Love Island star stripped off to share a glimpse into his lavish break in Bali with his influencer girlfriend Sarah Godfrey.

The smitten couple left little to the imagination as they posed naked in their romantic private villa setting.

Sarah flaunted her impossibly tiny waist as she dipped in the swimming pool while Adam, 23, barely covered his modesty while tensing around the poolside.

(Image: Instagram)

The duo's desperate attempt to encourage Instagram followers and likes led a flurry of fans to comment on their enviable bodies.

The power couple set up the ultimate Instagram-worthy snap to impress their supporters.

Adam and Sarah are currently holidaying in Bali and have shared every Instagrammable moment with their eagle-eyed followers.

(Image: Instagram)

A series of posed snaps flaunted Adam's charming muscles and Sarah's incredible curves in tiny swimwear.

With both of them sporting fresh golden tans, supporters have been impressed by their luxury, sun-soaked trip.

Adam's naked snap comes after the former reality star opted to get his tattoo dedicated to ex-girlfriend Zara McDermott covered up during a lads holiday to LA with the Love Island boys.

(Image: ITV/REX/Shutterstock)

The 23-year-old got a 'Z' tattooed on his hand after just weeks of dating, in honour of his then girlfriend.

The recent tattoo trip comes as the former Love Island hunk enjoyed a lads holiday in America, alongside co-stars Jack Fowler and Sam Bird.

The boys sampled the delights of LA with trips to Venice Beach and Muscle Beach, among other tourist destinations.

(Image: Mike Marsland/WireImage)

While Adam may have found brief love in the famous ITV2 villa, he has now been dating Dublin model Sarah for several months.

Adam split from his former Love Island girlfriend Zara back in February over his wild partying ways.

Zara is now dating Made In Chelsea's Sam Thompson.
description: The former Love Island hunk left little to the imagination as he stripped naked for a self-timed Instagram snap
